name: Square Light
description:
Take part in a challenging adventure and help a little square of light pass through the darkness! It won't be easy...Cool graphics, amazing music, simple controls - all this features makes Square Light a good way to spend your free time.

Here you can find portals and gravity experiments! Game available absolutely for free without any ads. So, what are you waiting for? :) Download Square Light and challenge yourself!

If you find Square Light interesting, amazing or may be worst, please leave your feedback and rate this game. Your thoughts are really important for me, because it helps me make Square Light better.

I hope you'll enjoy this adventure. Good luck!

Music: It's A Mystery by Lee Rosevere.
